attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned feel that the pay and conditions of MP's and public councillors have become obscene.  The public now feel that their servants are serving themselves now insteasd of their people. There is a lack of trust in members brought about by this.  We feel a cut in pay and a more rigorous and fair consideration of their expenses is desperately needed to replace trust.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reduce MP pay and expenses."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17700


Prime Minister's Office
